function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Overlapping transmission of multiple parasitic or viral diseases by the same species of mosquito.","Impact":"Increased risk of multiple disease outbreaks in overlapping locations.","Mitigation":"Integrated vector management and targeted vector control strategies.","Technologies":"Genetic modification of mosquitoes, insecticide-treated bed nets, and larval source management.","People":"Communities in overlapping locations where disease transmission occurs.","Owner":"Public health authorities and local community organizations."},{"Description":"Compartmentalized disease surveillance and reporting systems with fragmented international networks.","Impact":"Inadequate response to co-infections and lack of comprehensive disease surveillance.","Mitigation":"Integration of disease surveillance systems and standardized reporting mechanisms.","Technologies":"Digital health platforms, data visualization tools, and interoperable surveillance systems.","People":"Public health agencies, international organizations, and research institutions.","Owner":"Global health organizations and collaborative research initiatives."},{"Description":"Limited attention to the pervasive co-infection in neglected tropical diseases (NTDs).","Impact":"Neglect of co-infection patterns and limited focus on comprehensive treatment and control strategies.","Mitigation":"Inclusion of co-infection research in NTD programs and funding for integrated treatment interventions.","Technologies":"Diagnostic tools for identifying multiple infections, combination drug therapies, and innovative treatment delivery models.","People":"Communities affected by neglected tropical diseases and co-infections.","Owner":"NGOs, public health agencies, and research institutions."}]}
